SamPy.stis.ObservationScheduleÂ¶

This script can be used to parse instrument specific observations from SMS messages. It can also be used to generate memory dump schedule from the SMS.

The script can automatically email generated schedules to a given email address.

The calendar and SMS status can be found from: http://www.stsci.edu/reports/spss-status.html

USAGE:

python ObservationSchedule.py [flags] where flags can be following -v : verbose mode on -s sms_number e.g. 09299 -i instrument_name e.g. STIS -d dump_file e.g. 092297e3 -o output_file -e email address e.g. niemi@stsci.edu

E.g python ObservationSchedule.py -i STIS -s 09229 -d 092297e3

DEPENDS:
Python 2.5 (no 3.0 compatible)
EXITSTA:
0: No errors

-9: No command line flags given

HISTORY:
Aug 17 2009: Initial Version 0.1 Nov 20 2009: Version 0.2 (added email sending option)
author:Sami-Matias Niemi (niemi@stsci.edu) for STScI
